end-date.description: The date a record stopped being applicable.

local-authority-eng.description: The local authority's ISO 3166-1 alpha3 code. Unique codes have been created for local authorities that don't have an existing ISO code.

local-authority-type.description: The type of a local government organisation.

name.description: The commonly-used name of a record.

official-name.description: The official or technical name of a record.

start-date.description: The date a record first became relevant to a register.
